name: Bollinger Bands Mean Reversion Strategy
description: A mean reversion strategy using Bollinger Bands. Buys when price touches the lower band (oversold) and sells when price touches the upper band (overbought).
author: QuantLib

parameters.name: bb_window
parameters.description: Moving average period for Bollinger Bands

parameters.name: bb_std
parameters.description: Number of standard deviations for band width

documentation: Bollinger Bands consist of a moving average with upper and lower bands based on standard deviation. This strategy assumes prices will revert to the mean when they touch the bands, making it a mean reversion approach.
